name: Animals Quiz
description:
Please Rate my Game in Pure Text Jam($5 prize) I want to open a account in Play store So please help me collecting $25 By rate me as much as possible.

A very simple and Interesting Game.

Sharp you brain with this awesome animal quiz game.

This game is made of pure text without any sound and pictures(Graphics).

How to play?

Just click on "click here for typing the answer " and then answer the question correctly.

Test you brain and know how you are sharp
